mapper.select: /* archiveMapper.selectUserUid */ SELECT USER_UID FROM USER WHERE ARCHIVE_NAME = CONVERT_DASH_TO_SPACE(#{archiveName})
/* archiveMapper.selectCategoryName */ SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM `CATEGORY` WHERE CATEGORY_UID = #{currentCategoryUid}

/* archiveMapper.selectArticle */ SELECT RSLT.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CATEGORY_UID ORDER BY REGISTRATION_DATE ASC) AS NUM , TITLE AS title , CONTENT AS content , DATE_FORMAT(REGISTRATION_DATE, '%Y. %m. %d') AS registrationDate , FLAG_DELETED AS flagDeleted FROM ARTICLE WHERE REGISTRATION_USER = #{currentArchiveUserUid} AND CATEGORY_UID = #{currentCategoryUid} ) RSLT WHERE RSLT.NUM = #{currentArticleNumber}
